mapper.insert: insert into chance (id, clientname, outline, person, phone, createperson, createtime, source, success) VALUES (#{id}, #{clientname}, #{outline}, #{person}, #{phone}, #{createperson}, #{createtime}, #{source}, #{success})
mapper.update: update chance set clientname=#{clientname}, outline=#{outline}, person=#{person}, phone=#{phone}, createperson=#{createperson}, createtime=#{createtime}, source=#{source}, success=#{success} where id=#{id}
